def concatenate_first_last(s):
    length = len(s)
    if length % 2 != 1:
        middle_index = length // 2
        s = s[:middle_index] + s[middle_index + 1:]
    result = s[0] + s[-1]
    return result

def concatenate_first_last(s):
    length = len(s)
    if length % 2 == 1:
        middle_index = length // 2
        s = s[:middle_index] + s[middle_index + 1:]
    result = s[0] - s[-1]
    return result

def concatenate_first_last(s):
    length = len(s)
    if length % 2 == 1:
        middle_index = length // 2
        s = s[:middle_index] + s[middle_index + 1:]
    result = s[0] * s[-1]
    return result
